title: Account Manager
content:
With millions of diners, tens of thousands of restaurants, and 23+ years of experience, OpenTable, part of Booking Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: BKNG), is an industry leader with a unique insight into the world of hospitality. We champion restaurants, bars, wineries, and other venues around the world, helping them attract guests, manage capacity, improve operations and maximize revenue.
Every employee at OpenTable has a tangible impact on what we do and how we do it. You’ll also be part of a global network that includes OpenTable and KAYAK's portfolio of travel brands including Swoodoo, checkfelix, momondo, Cheapflights, Mundi and HotelsCombined.
Hospitality is all about taking care of others, and it defines our culture. You’ll work in a welcoming and inclusive environment, and get the benefits, flexibility, and support you need to succeed.
Role & Responsibilities
Reporting to the Team Lead, in this position you will be responsible for leading customer retention and revenue growth within your territory of restaurants.
In your role, you will be in tune with the local restaurant industry and will proactively engage with our restaurant customers. You will be innovative in overcoming customer obstacles, and provide constructive perspectives to challenge current thinking. The successful candidate will be positive and encouraging by nature, resilient under pressure, and regularly sought after for insight, input, and collaboration..
 
Successful Account Managers will meet and exceed goals on a monthly, quarterly, and annual basis. Meeting your goals is centred around your ability to:

Work closely with customers to increase product and feature adoption, improve their online availability and ultimately grow their business through our partnership.
Become a trusted adviser to our customers and influencing an ongoing retention of their business with us
Maintain an experienced level of understanding of all products and services that OpenTable offers.
Proactively incorporate company strategies into your work and constantly be on the lookout for opportunities to increase your impact with customers.
Share and implement standard methodologies with members of the sales and restaurant relations team.
Be highly visible and frequently face-to-face with our customers in field.
Stay current with organisational changes, initiatives, and vision.
Work collaboratively with colleagues and key internal stakeholders 

Please Apply If

You are passionate about hospitality and technology.  Restaurant management and/or sales experience in the food and beverage industry is preferred but not essential..
You are curious, humble and have an eagerness to learn
You are able to effectively influence and use data to guide your decisions 
You’re self-motivated and have the grit necessary to thrive against ambitious expectations.
You naturally communicate well, and can establish trust with people genuinely and quickly.
Proficient in use of Google Suite, and Salesforce CRM 

Benefits

Work from (almost) anywhere
Mental Health Well-being: 6 company paid therapy sessions, subscription to a meditation app, wellbeing speaker series and resources.
Annual Health and Wellness Reimbursement.
1 floating day off per year to celebrate your birthday or another occasion of your choice!
Company-wide weeks off each year: the whole team recharges (and returns without a pile-up of work!).
Weekly catered office events.
Ongoing Learning and Development opportunities.
Universal Paid Parental leave.

Diversity And Inclusion
We aspire to have a workplace that reflects all of the communities we serve. We know that when we have diverse teams we produce more creative ideas, products, and better outcomes. OpenTable is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer, and we encourage candidates from all backgrounds and experiences to apply for our roles. Whoever you are, just be you!. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, perform job responsibilities, and receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.
#LI-EK1

questions.description: KAYAK Software Corporation, OpenTable, Inc., their respective subsidiaries and Momondo A/S (together, ‘KAYAK and OpenTable”, “our/we/us”, or “Company”) will process your personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws for the purposes described in our privacy notice (Germany and All Other Locations). As part of the application process KAYAK and/or OpenTable may share your personal data across our group of companies, subject to our privacy notice and applicable laws.  In order to consider you for new positions, KAYAK and/or OpenTable may keep your personal data for 6 months (within the EU) and 2 years (in all other regions), unless otherwise required by applicable law.
